achievements.trigger: lap_manager.cross_finish_line() — first time any player completes lap 1
lap_manager.race_finished signal — first time any player completes 3 laps
car_controller drift_time >= 3.0 seconds in a single drift
Race completed with wall_hit_count == 0 (counter not yet tracked)
achievements.hook: Not implemented — needs wall collision counter

achievements.trigger: All 4 checkpoints hit in a single lap (already validated by lap_manager)
New best lap time < previous best (needs save system for persistence)
Total races completed >= 10 (needs persistent counter via save system)

notes: Achievement hooks require: (1) in-game event listeners on existing signals, (2) save system for persistence, (3) UI toast/popup for unlock notification. See achievements.json for point values and display data.
